tasks.reword-commit: bash -lc 'sha=${1:-}; if [ -z "$sha" ]; then read -r sha; fi; [ -n "$sha" ] || exit 1; if git rev-list --max-parents=0 HEAD | grep -qx "$sha"; then echo "Picked root commit; no parent to rebase."; exit 1; fi; git rebase -i "${sha}^"'
tasks.pick-reword: bash -lc 'deno task pick-commit | deno task reword-commit'
tasks.view-diff: bash -lc 'sha=${1:-}; if [ -z "$sha" ]; then read -r sha; fi; [ -n "$sha" ] && git -c color.ui=always show "$sha" | less -R'
tasks.pick-diff: bash -lc 'deno task pick-commit | deno task view-diff'
